properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 15 at 3:13AM PST until January 15 at 9:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 9 to 11 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 15 to 25
kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 8 to 11 feet at 13 seconds
expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 3 AM
PST Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 AM this
morning to 9 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM PST THURSDAY
